org.apache.heron.api.state

Interface State<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Map<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HashMapState

    public interface State<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.util.Map<K,V>
    State represents the state interface as seen by stateful bolts and spouts. In Heron, state gives a notional Key/Value interface along with the ability to iterate over the key/values

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map

        java.util.Map.Entry<K,V>

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.Map

        clear, compute, computeIfAbsent, computeIfPresent, containsKey, containsValue, entrySet, equals, forEach, get, getOrDefault, hashCode, isEmpty, keySet, merge, put, putAll, putIfAbsent, remove, remove, replace, replace, replaceAll, size, values
